prompt: You are a business consultant or industry expert specializing in the animation arts industry. As someone interested in starting a business in this field, I am seeking your guidance and inspiration. Please provide a range of creative and viable business ideas within the animation arts industry. Consider different segments such as animation production, character licensing, digital content creation, animation education, or animation software development. For each idea, please include a brief description of its potential target audience, revenue streams, and competitive advantages. Please present the ideas in a well-structured list or table format.
